root.name: Seek 'n Spell
root.description: Overview Seek 'n Spell is a virtual reality puzzle game where you must collect letters to create words. By using the GPS functionality on your phone, you and your friends search for letters that are laid around the environment you're currently standing in. You must then run around while staring at your phone to find letters that are then stored in your letter pool. You must then sort through your pool and One of the many risks of playing Seek 'n Search. make words to score points. You have a limited amount of time to do this and the one with the most amount of time by the end of the match wins. Seek 'n spell only works on 3G versions of phones. You are encouraged to play the game in large open areas where there is a clear view of the sky.
